default.comment: Background color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

hover.comment: Background color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

active.comment: Background color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

default.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

active.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

default.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color

hover.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color.

active.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color.

disabled.comment: Background color for disabled state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

on.comment: Background color for on state of UI Elements such as toggle

off.comment: Background color for off state of UI Elements such as toggle

highlight.comment: Background color of highlight interactive color. Used on date range in Calendar

active.comment: Border color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

default.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

active.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

default.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color

hover.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color.

active.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color.

disabled.comment: Border color for disabled state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

on-dark.comment: Border color for selected items on dark background.

default.comment: Text color of primary interactive color e.g. links

hover.comment: Text color of primary color hover interactive state e.g. secondary buttons

active.comment: Text color of primary color pressed interactive state   e.g. ghost button

default.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

active.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

on-dark-default.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary button on a dark background

on-dark-hover.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary button on a dark background

on-dark-active.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary button on a dark background

disabled.comment: Text color for disabled state of UI Elements

on-primary.comment: Text color on top of primary interactive color

on-secondary.comment: Text color on top of secondary interactive color
